summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Get Engaged program established by Ordinance 120325; adding one young adult position to the Seattle Arts Commission, the Seattle Design Commission, the City Planning Commission, the Design Review Board (Capitol Hill Board), the Pioneer Square Preservation Board, and the Landmarks Preservation Board; and amending Chapters 3.51, 3.56, 3.58, 3.64, 23.41, 23.66 and 25.12 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
